hero para.Eng: Solve All Your Digital Transaction Needs
hero para.Oro: Fedhii gabaa dijitaalaa keessan hunda furuu

in ethiopia and.Oro: Ityoophiyaa fi biyyoota biroo keessatti gahumsa qabu babal’isuu

work with us para.Eng: Addissystems PLC is ERP, Electronic Invoicing and E-POS company that delivers convenient, innovative, safe and secure financial softwares services in Ethiopia by leveraging the latest technology platform in the industry and developing user-oriented products and services.
work with us para.Amh: አዲስ ሲስተምስ ኃ.የተ.የግ.ማህበር ኢአርፒ፣ ኤሌክትሮኒክስ ኢንቮይሲንግ እና ኢ-POS ኩባንያ ሲሆን ምቹ፣ ፈጠራ ያለው፣ ደህንነቱ የተጠበቀ እና ደህንነቱ የተጠበቀ የፋይናንሺያል ሶፍትዌሮችን በኢንዱስትሪው ውስጥ ያለውን ዘመናዊ መድረክ በመጠቀም እና ተጠቃሚ ተኮር ምርቶችን እና አገልግሎቶችን በማልማት በኢትዮጵያ ውስጥ ያቀርባል።
work with us para.Oro: Addissystems PLC dhaabbata ERP, Electronic Invoicing fi E-POS kan ta’ee fi tajaajila sooftiweerii faayinaansii mijataa, kalaqa, nageenya qabuu fi nageenya qabu Itoophiyaa keessatti kan kennu yoo ta’u, waltajjii teeknooloojii ammayyaa indaastiricha keessatti argamu fayyadamuun oomishaalee fi tajaajiloota fayyadamtoota irratti xiyyeeffatan hojjechuudhaani.

pos-para1.Eng: Automate time-consuming procedures, avoid manual entry that is prone to error, and quickly spot and correct problems to keep business operations operating smoothly and customers satisfied.
pos-para1.Amh: ጊዜ የሚወስዱ ሂደቶችን በራስ ሰር ማድረግ፣ ለስህተት የተጋለጠ በእጅ መግባትን ያስወግዱ እና ችግሮችን በፍጥነት በመለየት የንግድ ስራዎችን በአግባቡ እንዲሰራ እና ደንበኞች እንዲረኩ ያድርጉ።
pos-para1.Oro: Hojimaata yeroo fudhatu ofumaan hojjechuu, harkaan seenuu dogoggoraaf saaxilamu irraa fagaachuu, akkasumas hojiin daldalaa haala gaariin akka hojjetuu fi maamiltoonni akka itti quufan gochuuf rakkoolee dafanii adda baasuu fi sirreessuu.

pos-para2.Eng: With automated supply chain document flows that lighten workloads, businesses may become more agile and speed their time to revenue.
pos-para2.Amh: የስራ ጫናን በሚያቃልል የአቅርቦት ሰንሰለት ሰነድ ፍሰቶች፣ንግዶች የበለጠ ቀልጣፋ ሊሆኑ እና ጊዜያቸውን ለገቢ ማፋጠን ይችላሉ።
pos-para2.Oro: Dhangala’aa sanadoota dhiyeessii sansalataa ofumaan fe’iinsa hojii salphisuun, daldaltoonni caalaatti socho’uu fi yeroo isaanii gara galii saffisiisuu danda’u.

pos-p1.Eng: Easy Payments With Addis POS services
pos-p1.Amh: ቀላል የክፍያ አገልግሎት ከ አዲስ ኢፖስ
pos-p1.Oro: Kaffaltii Salphaa Tajaajila Addis POS Waliin

pos-title.Eng: Easy Payments With Addis POS services
pos-title.Amh: ቀላል የክፍያ አገልግሎት ከ አዲስ ኢፖስ
pos-title.Oro: Kaffaltii Salphaa Tajaajila Addis POS Waliin

POS-system-para.Eng: An electronic Point of Sale (POS) system is a web-based software solution that enables businesses to process transactions, manage inventory, and track sales data electronically. It replaces traditional cash registers and manual record-keeping with a digital platform that streamlines the entire sales process. With an electronic POS system, merchants can accept various payment methods, generate digital receipts and QR code for payment, and gain real-time insights into their business performance.We developed Addis EPOS to streamline transaction process of retail stores, restaurants, hospitality industry, Service-based businesses, convenience stores, supermarkets, E-commerce businesses etc
POS-system-para.Amh: አጠቃላይ የሽያጭ ሂደቱን ያሳልጣል። ነጋዴዎች በኢፖስ ሲስተም አማካኝነት ከተለያዩ የመክፈያ መንገዶች ክፍያን መቀበል፣ ዲጂታል ደረሰኞችን እና ኪው አር ኮድን ለክፍያ ማመንጨት እንዲሁም ስለ ንግድ ስራቸው እንቅስቃሴ አሁናዊና ትክክለኛ ግንዛቤዎችን ማግኘት ይችላሉ። የችርቻሮ መደብሮችን፣ ሬስቶራንቶችን፣ የመስተንግዶ ኢንደስትሪወችን፣ አገልግሎት ሰጪ ድርጅቶችን፣ሱቆችን፣ ሱፐርማርኬቶችን፣ ኢ-ኮሜርስ ንግዶችን እና የመሳሰሉትን የንግድ ተቋማት የንግድ ልውውጥ ሂደት ለማቀላጠፍ አዲስ ኢፖስን አዘጋጅተናል።
POS-system-para.Oro: Sirni POS jechuun walnyaatinsa haardwaarii fi sooftiweerii kaffaltii dijitaalaa bifa adda addaa fudhachuu fi adeemsisuuf barbaachisan jechuudha. Haardwaariin kun maashinii fudhatama kaardii kan of keessaa qabu yoo ta’u, sooftiweerichi mala kaffaltii hafe, adeemsaafi tajaajiloota gatii dabalataa naannoo biroo ni qabata

ERP-title.Eng: Easy Payments With Addis POS services
ERP-title.Amh: ቀላል የክፍያ አገልግሎት በ አዲስ ኢፖስ
ERP-title.Oro: Kaffaltii Salphaa Tajaajila Addis POS Waliin

ERP-para.Eng: Enterprise resource planning, or ERP, software enables businesses to control all facets of their operations, including finance, human resources, manufacturing, sales, planning, and supply chain, from a single interface. Accounting, project management, planning, customer relationship management and compliance, procurement, and other business operations can all be integrated and automated with the help of enterprise resource planning software. Business executives can make better decisions thanks to the automation of all internal processes enabled by ERP software solutions, which also give them access to vital real-time data and insights.
ERP-para.Amh: የኢንተርፕራይዝ ሪሶርስ ፕላኒንግ ወይም ኢአርፒ ሶፍትዌር የንግድ ድርጅቶች ሁሉንም የስራ እንቅስቃሴዎቻቸውን ማለትም ፋይናንስ፣ የሰው ሃይል፣ ማምረትን፣ ሽያጭ፣ እቅድን እና የአቅርቦት ሰንሰለትን ጨምሮ፣ ከአንድ በይነገጽ እንዲቆጣጠሩ ያስችላቸዋል። የሂሳብ አያያዝ፣ የፕሮጀክት አስተዳደር፣ እቅድ፣ የደንበኞች ግንኙነት አስተዳደር ፣ግዥ እና ሌሎች የንግድ ስራዎችን በሙሉ በኢንተርፕራይዝ ሪሶርስ ፕላኒንግ ሶፍትዌር በመታገዝ ሊቀናጁ እና አውቶሜትድ ሊሆኑ ይችላሉ።ለኢአርፒ ሶፍትዌር  መፍትሄዎች ሁሉንም የውስጥ ሂደቶች አውቶማቲክ በማድረግ ምስጋና ይግባውና ለንግድ ሥራ አስፈፃሚዎች አስፈላጊውን የአሁናዊ መረጃን እና ግንዛቤዎችን በመስጠት የተሻሉ ውሳኔዎችን እንዲወስኑ ያስችላቸዋል።
ERP-para.Oro: Softiweeriin karoorri qabeenya dhaabbilee ykn ERP, dhaabbileen daldalaa faayinaansii, humna namaa, omishaa, gurgurtaa, karooraa fi dhiyeessii dabalatee gama hojii isaanii hunda interfeesii tokko irraa akka to’atan dandeessisa. Herrega, bulchiinsa pirojektii, karoora, bulchiinsa hariiroo maamiltootaa fi walsimannaa, bittaa, fi hojiiwwan daldalaa biroo hundi isaanii gargaarsa sooftiweerii karoora qabeenya dhaabbataatiin walitti makamuu fi ofumaan hojjechuu ni danda’u. Hojii gaggeessitoonni daldalaa murtoo fooyya’aa kennuu kan danda’an adeemsa keessoo hunda furmaata sooftiweerii ERPn dandeessifame ofumaan hojjechuudhaan, kunis daataa fi hubannoo yeroo qabatamaa barbaachisaa ta’e akka argatan kan taasisudha.

Lower Cost-para.Eng: To save time and money, eliminate manual paper-based operations, connect to all trading partners, and share information in any format through a single connection.
Lower Cost-para.Amh: ጊዜን እና ገንዘብን ለመቆጠብ በእጅ የሚሰሩ በወረቀት ላይ የተመሰረቱ ስራዎችን ያስወግዱ ፤ ከሁሉም የንግድ አጋርዎ ጋር ይገናኙ እንዲሁም በማንኛውም  ፎርማት ያለን መረጃ  በአንድ ንክኪ ያጋሩ።
Lower Cost-para.Oro: Yeroo fi maallaqa qusachuuf, hojiiwwan waraqaa harkaan hojjetaman dhabamsiisuu, michoota daldalaa hunda waliin wal qunnamsiisuu, fi odeeffannoo bifa kamiinuu karaa walqunnamtii tokkoon qooduu.

ERP service para.Eng: Use the industry-leading B2B/ERP Service integration to stay competitive, connect with partners fast, and satisfy buyer and vendor connectivity needs.
ERP service para.Amh: ተወዳዳሪ ለመሆን፣ ከአጋሮች ጋር በፍጥነት ለመገናኘት እንዲሁም የገዢ እና የሻጭ  ፍላጎቶችን ለማርካት በ ቢ ቱ ቢ/ኢ አር ፒ(B2B/ERP) አገልግሎት የሚመራውን ኢንዱስትሪ ይጠቀሙ።
ERP service para.Oro: Dorgommii keessa turuuf, michoota waliin saffisaan wal qunnamuuf, fi fedhii walitti hidhamiinsa bitaa fi gurgurtootaa guutuuf walitti makamuu Tajaajila B2B/ERP industirii keessatti adda duree ta’e fayyadami.

Increased revenue-para.Eng: Business Intelligence helps businesses to identify new revenue sources and indicate new line of opportunities for growth.
Increased revenue-para.Amh: የቢዝነስ ኢንተለጀንስ ንግዶች አዳዲስ የገቢ ምንጮችን እንዲለዩ እና አዲስ የእድገት እድሎችን እንዲያመለክቱ ይረዳል።
Increased revenue-para.Oro: Business Intelligence dhaabbileen daldalaa madda galii haaraa adda baasuu fi sarara carraa guddinaa haaraa akka agarsiisan gargaara.

Transforms tax compliance-para.Eng: Business Intelligence services can helps tax authority to identify non-compliant taxpayers and take appropriate action.
Transforms tax compliance-para.Amh: የቢዝነስ ኢንተለጀንስ አገልግሎቶች የታክስ ባለስልጣን ታዛዥ ያልሆኑ ግብር ከፋዮችን ለመለየት እና ተገቢውን እርምጃ እንዲወስዱ ያግዛል።
Transforms tax compliance-para.Oro: Tajaajilli Odeeffannoo Bizinesii abbaa taayitaa gibiraa kaffaltoota gibiraa seera hin eegne adda baasuu fi tarkaanfii barbaachisaa ta’e akka fudhatu gargaaruu danda’a.

Shorter Payment Cycles-para.Eng: E-invoicing can help shorten payment cycles by making it easier for businesses to track and process invoices. This can help businesses to pay faster and improve their cash flow.
Shorter Payment Cycles-para.Amh: ኢ-ደረሰኝ የንግድ ድርጅቶች ክፍያዎቻቸውን ለመከታተልና ለማዘጋጀት ቀላል እንዲሆንላቸው በማድረግ የክፍያ ዑደቶችን ለማሳጠር ይረዳል። ይህም የንግድ ድርጅቶች በፍጥነት እንዲከፍሉና የገንዘብ ዝውውራቸውን እንዲያሻሽሉ ሊረዳቸው ይችላል ።
Shorter Payment Cycles-para.Oro: Invooyisiin elektirooniksii dhaabbileen daldalaa invoice hordofuu fi adeemsisuuf salphaa taasisuudhaan marsaa kaffaltii gabaabsuuf gargaaruu danda’a. Kunis daldaltoonni saffisaan akka kaffalan fi maallaqa isaanii akka fooyyessuuf gargaaruu danda’a.

Automation-para.Eng: E-invoicing can help automate the invoicing process, making it faster and more efficient. This can help businesses save time and money.
Automation-para.Amh: ኢ-ደረሰኝ የክፍያ መጠየቂያ ሂደቱን ራስ-ሰር ወይም አውቶሜት በማድረግ ፈጣን እና ቀልጣፋ ያደርገዋል። ይህም የንግድ ድርጅቶች ገንዘባቸውንና ጊዜያቸውን እንዲቆጥቡ ያስችላቸዋል።
Automation-para.Oro: E-invoicing adeemsa invoicing ofumaan hojjechuuf gargaaruu danda’a, kunis saffisaa fi bu’a qabeessa akka ta’u taasisa. Kunis dhaabbileen daldalaa yeroo fi maallaqa akka qusatan gargaaruu danda’a.

Electronic Invoice-title.Eng: We automate the E-invoicing process, saving businesses time and money
Electronic Invoice-title.Amh: በኢ-ደረሰኝ የክፍያ መጠየቂያ ሂደትን አውቶሜት በማድረግ የንግድ ድርጅትዎን ጊዜ እና ገንዘብ እንቆጥባለን።
Electronic Invoice-title.Oro: Adeemsa E-invoicing ofumaan hojjenna, yeroo fi maallaqa daldalaa qusanna

Business I title.Eng: Easy Payments With Addis POS services
Business I title.Amh: የአዲስ የንግድ ኢንተልጀንሲ አገልግሎት ጥምርታ ጥቅሞች
Business I title.Oro: Kaffaltii Salphaa Tajaajila Addis POS Waliin

Business I para1.Eng: Business Intelligence is the application of data analytics techniques and digital technology for the purpose of collecting, storing, and analyzing business data for the purpose of driving business insights and making informed decisions. It is software that ingests business data and presents it in user-friendly views such as reports, dashboards, charts, and graphs. Businesses and organizations have questions and goals. To answer these questions and track performance against these goals, they gather the necessary data, analyze it, and determine which actions to take to reach their goals. On the technical side, raw data is collected from business systems. Data is processed and then stored  ndata warehouses, the cloud, applications, and files. Once it is stored, users can access the data, starting the analysis process to answer business questions. In general, BI services can help businesses to leverage the data contained in electronic invoices to gain insights into their operations and make informed decisions that can improve their  erformance and competitiveness.
Business I para1.Amh: ቢዝነስ ኢንተልጀንሲ የመረጃ ትንተና ቴክኒኮችን እና የዲጂታል ቴክኖሎጂን በመጠቀም የንግድ ስራ መረጃን በመሰብሰብ ፣ በማከማቸት እና በመተንተን  ግንዛቤዎችን ለማሳደግ እና በመረጃ ላይ የተመሠረተ ውሳኔ ለማድረግ የሚጠቅም ነው። የንግድ መረጃን እንደ ግብአት በመጠቀም ለተጠቃሚ ምቹ ወይም ተስማሚ እይታዎች የሚፈጥሩ እንደ ሪፖርቶች፣ ዳሽቦርዶች፣ ቻርቶቸን እና ግራፎችን የሚያቀርብ ሶፍትዌር ነው። የንግድ ድርጅቶች እና ተቋማት ጥያቄዎች እና ግቦች አሏቸው። እነዚህን ጥያቄዎች ለመመለስ እና የእነዚህን ግቦች አፈፃፀም ለመከታተል የንግድ ተቋማቱ አስፈላጊውን መረጃ ይሰበስባሉ ፣ ይተነትናሉ እንዲሁም ግቦቻቸውን ለማሳካት የትኛውን እርምጃ እንደሚወስዱ ይወስናሉ። ቴክኒካል ከሆነው ሲጀመር ጥሬ መረጃ ወይም ውሂብ ከንግድ ድርጅቱ ስርአቶች ይሰበሰባል።ከዚያም ውሂቡ ወይም መረጃው ተጠናክሮ በመረጃ ማከማቻወች ውስጥ እንደ ክላውድ፣ አፕሊኬሽኖች እና ፋይሎች ውስጥ ይከማቻል። ተከማችቶ ካለቀ በኋላ ተጠቃሚዎች የንግድ ጥያቄዎቻችውን ለመመለስ የትንታኔ ሂደቱን በመጀመር ውሂቡን  ወይም መረጃውን ማግኘት ይችላሉ። በአጠቃላይ የቢዝነስ ኢንተልጀንሲ  አገልግሎቶች የንግድ ድርጅቶች በኢ-ደረሰኞች ውስጥ ያለውን መረጃ በመጠቀም ስለ ንግድ ስራዎቻቸው ግንዛቤን ለማግኘት እና አፈፃፀማቸውን እና ተወዳዳሪነታቸውን የሚያሻሽል በመረጃ ላይ የተመሰረተ ውሳኔ እንዲወስኑ ይረዳቸዋል።
Business I para1.Oro: Business Intelligence jechuun tooftaalee xiinxala daataa fi teeknooloojii dijitaalaa kaayyoo daataa daldalaa walitti qabuu, kuusuu fi xiinxaluuf kaayyoo hubannoo daldalaa oofuu fi murtoo odeeffannoo irratti hundaa’e kennuudha. Softiweeriin daataa daldalaa liqimsee ilaalcha fayyadamaadhaaf mijatu kan akka gabaasa, daashboordii, chaartii fi giraafii keessatti dhiyeessudha. Dhaabbileen daldalaa fi dhaabbileen gaaffii fi galma qabu. Gaaffiiwwan kana deebisuufi raawwii hojii galmoota kanaan wal bira qabuun hordofuuf ragaa barbaachisaa ta’e walitti qabuun xiinxaluudhaan galma isaanii bira ga’uuf tarkaanfiiwwan kam akka fudhatan murteessu. Gama teeknikaatiin ammoo daataa raw sirna daldalaa irraa walitti qabama. Deetaan ni adeemsifama sana booda kuusaawwan ndata, duumessa, application, fi faayiloota ni kuufama. Erga kuufamee booda fayyadamtoonni daataa sana argachuu danda’u, adeemsa xiinxala jalqabuun gaaffii daldalaa deebisuuf. Walumaagalatti tajaajilli BI dhaabbileen daldalaa daataa invooyisii elektirooniksii keessatti argamu fayyadamuun hojii isaanii irratti hubannoo akka argatan fi murtoo odeeffannoo irratti hundaa’ee fi ga’umsaa fi dorgommii isaanii fooyyessuu danda’u akka murteessan gargaaruu danda’a.

M-pos para1.Eng: M-POS, or Mobile Point of Sale, refers to a system that allows businesses to process transactions, such as sales and payments, using mobile devices like smartphones or tablets. This technology leverages software and hardware to transform mobile devices into portable payment terminals, similar to traditional point of sale (POS) systems found in retail stores.
M-pos para1.Amh: ኤም ፖስ ወይም ተንቀሳቃሽ የፖስ ማሽን የግብይት ሂደቶችን ማለትም እንደ ሽያጭ እና ክፍያዎች ስማርትፎኖችን ወይም ታብሌቶችን በመጠቀም የንግድ ድርጅቶች የንግድ ስራቸውን እንዲከውኑ የሚያስችል ስርዓትን ነው። ይህ ቴክኖሎጂ ሶፍትዌሮችን እና ሃርድዌሮችን በመጠቀም ተንቀሳቃሽ ስልኮችን ወደ ተንቀሳቃሽ የክፍያ ተርሚናሎች ቀይሯቸዋል፣ ልክ በችርቻሮ መደብሮች ውስጥ እንደሚገኙት ባህላዊ የፖስ ስርአቶች።

electronic-title.Eng: We automate the E-invoicing process, saving businesses time and money
electronic-title.Amh: የኢ-ደረሰኝ ሂደትን አውቶማቲክ በማድረግ የንግድ ድርጅትዎን ጊዜ እና ገንዘብ እንቆጥባለን።
electronic-title.Oro: Adeemsa E-invoicing ofumaan hojjenna, yeroo fi maallaqa daldalaa qusanna

electronic-para.Eng: E-invoice is a digital version of traditional paper invoice. It is created, processed, transmitted and stored electronically. It streamlines the billing process by automating the creation, delivery and payment of invoices, reducing errors, enhancing efficiency, and prompting quicker payments. An electronic invoice is a digital and efficient way for businesses to send bills to their customers. Instead of relying on traditional paper bills, e-invoicing allows businesses to send invoices directly to their customers via email or other electronic means.
electronic-para.Amh: ኢ-ደረሰኝ ማለት በተለምዶ የምንጠቀምበት የወረቀት ደረሰኝ ዲጅታል ፎርማትነው። ኢ-ደረሰኝ የሚሰራው፣ ሂደቱ የሚከናወነው፣ የሚሰራጨው እንዲሁም የሚከማቸው ኤሌክትሮኒካሊ ነው። ኢ-ደረሰኝ  ራስ ሰር በሆነ መልኩ ደረሰኞችን በመፍጠር፣ በማድረስ እና በመክፈል እንዲሁም ስህተቶችን በመቀነስ፣ ቅልጥፍናን በማሳደግ እና ክፍያዎችን በማፋጠን የሂሳብ አከፋፈል ሂደትን ቀላል ያደርጋል። ኢ-ደረሰኝ የንግድ ድርጅቶች ለደንበኞቻቸው ሂሳቦችን እንዲከፍሉ የሚልኩት ዲጂታል እና ቀልጣፋ መንገድ ነው። በመሆኑም ዘመኑን በማይዋጅ የወረቀት ደረሰኝ ላይ ከመተማመን ይልቅ የንግድ ተቆማት ኢ-ደረሰኞችን በኢሜል ወይም በሌላ የኤሌክትሮኒክስ መንገድ በቀጥታ ለደንበኞቻቸው እንዲልኩ ያስችላቸዋል።
electronic-para.Oro: Invooyisiin elektirooniksii jechuun hojii jijjiirraa meeshaalee dhiyeessaa fi bitaa gidduutti bifa elektirooniksiitiin argachuudha. Kaffaltiin ofumaan hojjetamu gahee invoice waraqaa irratti hundaa’e akka nagahee gibiraatti qabu guutummaatti bakka bu’a. Sirna e-invoicing sirrii ta’een baasii odeeffannoo daldalaa baasuu, erguu, kuusuu, argachuu fi kuusuu hir’isuu dandeenya. Qorannoon adda addaa qusannoo guddaa e-invoice kaffaltii waraqaa wajjin wal bira qabamee yoo ilaalamu agarsiisaniiru. Akka Komishiniin Awurooppaa jedhutti, invoice elektirooniksii ergaawwan e-data gurgurtaa meeshaalee ykn kenniinsa tajaajilaa irratti walitti qabaman yoo ta’u, kunis karaa elektirooniksii kan uumamu, kaffaltii kaffalu, ergamu, fudhatamu, kuufamuu fi bulfamuudha jedhamee hiikama. Invooyisiin elektirooniksii sirna kompiitaraa dhaabbata gurgurtaa meeshaalee ykn kenniinsa tajaajilaa irratti lakkoofsa eenyummaa gibiraa qabuu fi kompiitara qaamolee hirmaatan keessatti kuufamuu seera daldala elektirooniksiitiin ta’a.

about-us subT.Eng: Solve all your digital transaction needs.
about-us subT.Amh: ለሁሉም የዲጂታል ግብይት ፍላጎቶችዎ መፍትሄ ያብጁ ።

About the company para.Eng: Addissystems PLC is ERP, Electronic Invoicing and E-POS company that delivers convenient, innovative, safe and secure financial softwares services in Ethiopia by leveraging the latest technology platform in the industry and developing user-oriented products and services.
About the company para.Amh: አዲስ ሲስተምስ ኃ.የተ.የግ.ማህበር ኢአርፒ፣ ኢ-ደረሰኝ እና ኢ-ፖስ ሶፍትዌሮችን እና መተግበሪያወችን አበልጻጊ ኩባንያ ሲሆን፤ ምርቶቹም ለአጠቃቀም ምቹ፣በ ፈጠራ የታገዙ፣ አስተማማኝ እና ደህንነታቸው የተጠበቀ የፋይናንሺያል ሶፍትዌሮችን በኢንዱስትሪው ውስጥ ያለውን ዘመናዊ መድረክ በመጠቀም እና ተጠቃሚ ተኮር ምርቶችን እና አገልግሎቶችን በማልማት በኢትዮጵያ ውስጥ ያቀርባል።
About the company para.Oro: Addissystems PLC dhaabbata ERP, Electronic Invoicing fi E-POS kan ta’ee fi tajaajila sooftiweerota faayinaansii mijataa, kalaqa, nageenya qabuu fi nageenya qabu Itoophiyaa keessatti kan kennu yoo ta’u, waltajjii teeknooloojii ammayyaa indaastiricha keessatti argamu fayyadamuun oomishaalee fi tajaajiloota fayyadamtoota irratti xiyyeeffatan hojjechuudhaani.

Our Mission and Objective paragraph.Eng: Facilitate commerce for everyone. Facilitate domestic and cross border trade and enable citizens to enjoy financial and technological benefits through technology
Our Mission and Objective paragraph.Amh: ለሁሉም ሰው ንግድን ምቹ እና ቀላል በማድረግ፤በሀገር ውስጥ እና በውጪ ንግድን በማመቻቸት  ዜጎች የቴክኖሎጂን እና የገንዘብን  ጥቅሞች በቴክኖሎጂ አማካኝነት በአንድ እንዲያገኙ ማስቻል ነው።
Our Mission and Objective paragraph.Oro: Daldala hundaaf haala mijeessuu. Daldala biyya keessaa fi daangaa qaxxaamuraa haala mijeessuun lammiileen teeknooloojiin faayidaa maallaqaa fi teeknooloojii akka argatan taasisuu

Our vision paragraph.Eng: Provide a one-touch end-to-end commercial transaction experience for consumers and businesses in Africa.
Our vision paragraph.Amh: በአፍሪካ ውስጥ ላሉ ሸማቾች እና የንግድ ድርጅቶች በአንድ ንክኪ ከጫፍ ጫፍ የሚፈጸም የንግድ ልውውጥ ልምድን ማቅረብ።
Our vision paragraph.Oro: Fayyadamtootaa fi dhaabbilee daldalaa Afrikaa keessa jiraniif muuxannoo daldala daldalaa dhuma irraa gara dhumaatti tuqa tokkoon kennuu.

Solve All Your Digital Transaction Needs.Eng: Solve All Your Digital Transaction Needs.
Solve All Your Digital Transaction Needs.Amh: ለሁሉም የዲጂታል ግብይት ፍላጎቶችዎ መፍትሄ ያብጁ።
Solve All Your Digital Transaction Needs.Oro: Fedhii Daldala Dijitaalaa Keessan Hunda Furuu.

Contact-us para.Eng: we will get back to you as soon as possible

Contact-para.Eng: Facilitating e-commerce in Ethiopia and beyond.
Contact-para.Amh: ኢ-ንግድን በኢትዮጵያ እንዲሁም ከኢትዮጵያ ውጪ ማመቻቸት ።
Contact-para.Oro: Itiyoophiyaa fi achiin alatti daldala elektirooniksii haala mijeessuu.

Facilitate commerce for Ethiopia and bey.Eng: Facilitating e-commerce in Ethiopia and beyond.
Facilitate commerce for Ethiopia and bey.Amh: ኢ-ንግድን በኢትዮጵያ እንዲሁም ከኢትዮጵያ ውጪ ማመቻቸት ።
Facilitate commerce for Ethiopia and bey.Oro: Itiyoophiyaa fi achiin alatti daldala elektirooniksii haala mijeessuu.

moto-paragraph.Eng: Addiss systems facilitates domestic and cross border trade and enable citizens to enjoy financial and business benefits through technology.
moto-paragraph.Amh: የአድስ ሲስተም የሀገር ውስጥ እና የድንበር አቋራጭ ንግድን በማሳለጥ ዜጎች በቴክኖሎጂ የገንዘብ እና የንግድ ጥቅማጥቅሞችን እንዲያገኙ ያስችላል።
moto-paragraph.Oro: Sirni Addis daldala biyya keessaa fi daangaa qaxxaamuraa haala mijeessuun lammiileen karaa teeknooloojiin faayidaa maallaqaa fi daldalaa akka argatan kan taasisudha.

We’re here to help. Fill in the details.Eng: We’re here to help. Fill in the details below and one of our team members will get back to you shortly.
We’re here to help. Fill in the details.Amh: እኛ ለመርዳት እዚህ ነን። ዝርዝሩን ከዚህ በታች ይሙሉ እና ከቡድናችን አባላት አንዱ በቅርቡ ወደ እርስዎ ይመለሳል።
We’re here to help. Fill in the details.Oro: Gargaaruuf as jirra. Bal'ina armaan gadii guutaa miseensi garee keenyaa tokko yeroo gabaabaa keessatti isiniif deebi'a.
